hat.description: Trim - Cycle, MISUSE menus, MISUSE Shield

text-to-speech.text: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis/synthesis.xsd" xml:lang="en-US"> <prosody volume="medium" rate="fast">shield equalize</prosody> </speak>
